definitions: To make fun of or attempt to provoke (a person or animal) in a playful or malicious way.
To comb or untangle (hair or wool) with a comb or brush.
To separate or pull apart (fibers or material) into fine strands.
To entice or tempt (someone) with something desirable but unattainable or difficult to obtain.
examples: The children tease the cat with a feather.
She likes to tease her brother about his new haircut.
The stylist began to tease her hair for added volume.
He would often tease her with promises of a promotion.
